toys.name: Build Your Own Robot
toys.details: The Build Your Own Robot kit allows kids to assemble and customize their own robotic companion. It promotes problem-solving and creativity.

toys.name: Electronic Circuit Kit
toys.details: The Electronic Circuit Kit teaches children the basics of circuitry and electronics through hands-on experiments and projects.

toys.name: Coding Robot Car
toys.details: The Coding Robot Car introduces children to programming concepts and allows them to code their own robot car movements and behaviors.

toys.name: Coding Learning Kit
toys.details: The Coding Learning Kit provides a comprehensive coding curriculum and hands-on activities to teach kids coding and problem-solving skills.

toys.name: Chemistry Lab Set
toys.details: The Chemistry Lab Set includes various chemicals, lab equipment, and experiments to introduce children to the world of chemistry and scientific exploration.

toys.name: Microscope Kit
toys.details: The Microscope Kit comes with a high-quality microscope and slides, allowing kids to observe and explore the microscopic world.

name: Building Blocks Set
toyDetails: This building blocks set includes 100 pieces of colorful blocks, perfect for developing creativity and fine motor skills in children.

toys.name: Planetarium Projector
toys.details: The Planetarium Projector projects images of stars and planets onto the ceiling, providing an immersive astronomy experience at home.

toys.name: Constellation Puzzle
toys.details: The Constellation Puzzle features a map of the night sky, allowing kids to piece together constellations and learn about the stars.

toys.name: Interactive Globe
toys.details: The Interactive Globe provides an interactive learning experience, allowing kids to explore countries, capitals, and geographical facts.

toys.name: World Map Puzzle
toys.details: The World Map Puzzle features a detailed map of the world, encouraging kids to learn about countries, continents, and geography.

toys.name: Human Body Model
toys.details: The Human Body Model allows kids to explore the human anatomy, learn about organs and body systems, and understand how the body works.

toys.name: Skeleton Puzzle
toys.details: The Skeleton Puzzle features a 3D puzzle of a human skeleton, helping kids learn the names and locations of bones in a fun and engaging way.

name: Solar System Model
toyDetails: The solar system model kit comes with a set of 9 planets, including a light-up sun. It's a great educational tool to learn about our solar system.
